entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 2:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
